Changeset.Change: First release of the techno economic analysis portlet.
Added notification and improved error messages.
Choosing a model after reset now fills the fields with their default values instead of leaving them blank.
Fixed Microsoft Edge bug not bringing the fishSpecies when choosing a model
Added modules pattern. Moved various functionality to modules folder.
Changed button text from "Load analysis from Workspace" to "Load from Workspace".
Load from Workspace is now always visible.
Reset appears when an analysis is loaded.
Added tooltips for information and validation of parameter fields.
Refactored code and improved error messages.
